name: Mug
help: Delivers An Attack With A Potency Of 140.  Additional Effect: Increases The Chance Of Additional Items Being Dropped By Target If Mug Is Dealt Before, Or As, The Finishing Blow Viper Venom Effect: Changes Additional Effect To Absorb 50% Of Damage As HP
